items.title: Web Development
items.text: Building responsive, high-performance web applications with React.js/Next.js, ensuring seamless user experience, modern UI/UX, and scalable architecture.

items.title: UI/UX Design
items.text: Crafting intuitive, user-centric UI/UX designs with modern aesthetics, ensuring seamless navigation, accessibility, and engaging digital experiences.

items.title: Ecommerce
items.text: Developing high-performance eCommerce websites with React, ensuring smooth user experience, secure transactions, and scalable, conversion-focused design.

items.title: Wordpress
items.text: Designing and developing dynamic, SEO-friendly WordPress websites with custom themes, plugins, and seamless user experience for businesses and brands.

items.title: Figma Design
items.text: Creating pixel-perfect, user-friendly UI/UX designs in Figma with modern aesthetics, seamless navigation, and a focus on user engagement and accessibility.
